Name: Movavi Video Suite 2022 Steam Edition - Video Making Software: Video Editor Plus, Screen Recorder and Video Converter Premium
About the game: Movavi Video Suite is a 3 in 1 program: video editor, screen recorder, and video converter. Turn your gameplay footage into engaging Let’s Play videos, add special effects and save your comments with a webcam, and then convert your clip to any popular format. You can also record program manuals, play any movies and music, and upload files on different devices. Now DLC is available! Liven up your gameplay and upgrade your favorite characters. You can also add backgrounds, stickers, and titles from different effects sets — ‘Let’s Start a Vlog’, ‘Handy Set’, ‘VHS’, and more. We’ve prepared a gift for those who will buy Movavi Video Suite — a free effects set ‘Pixel Age’! Dive into nostalgia and try golden age titles and stickers, as if you were playing your favorite 8-bit game. What’s New? Integration with DLC Audio tools and effects Transitions with the built-in audios Fast Track HD for 4K и 8K movies Objects tracking Drawing on videos while recording Sharing audios on Google Drive Timeline upscaling for precise cutting Frame-by-frame preview on the timeline Time spinbox for the pinpoint cutting Undo/Redo tools Updated interface with a Bright theme Make Video Editing Your Favorite Playground Use your creativity to make the most engaging vlog ever – you have everything you need to do it. Manage your footage on a convenient multi-track timeline and don’t worry about large files – thanks to the Fast Track HD technology, your computer won’t freeze while working with Full HD and 4K videos. Try basic editing: trim, rotate and enhance clips, color-grade videos with lookup tables, join files with transitions — especially, transitions with the built-in sounds. When you’re done with the simple tools, try advanced features — Chroma Key, Stop Motion, and Object Animation, — insert stickers, logos, and titles. Cut, trim, and sync audio, normalize volume, tweak equalizer settings, and more. You can even create your own intro from anything you can find in the program: backgrounds, titles, stickers, callouts, and even music. Then save the clip and use it in every video you create. Convert Files at the Speed of Light Make sure your gameplay videos can be seen on any platform or device — thanks to 180+ supported formats and 200+ available mobile presets. You can use those presets to transform files to any smartphone, tablet, and laptop. Even the newest devices are available. Thanks to the SuperSpeed, you can convert files in no time, plus use other types of hardware acceleration: Intel HD Graphics, AMD, NVIDIA NVENC and CUDA. Before the conversion, you can perfect your clips. Scale up the timeline and use frame-by-frame preview to find the fragment you need. You can now cut your clip with pinpoint accuracy thanks to the time spinbox. Just set the right time to delete unwanted footage. You can also add filters, reduce the ‘red-eye’ effect, insert watermarks, and change brightness and contrast. Grab Everything From Your Desktop Capture any activity on your desktop: live streaming, video chats, webinars, and program usage. Overlay a webcam video, and you’ll get a real live screencast. You can also record audio and webcam video without recording the screen. Now it’s possible to draw on videos during the recording: leave comments, add arrows and geometric figures, and highlight the main objects. You can edit screenshots, too: crop, rotate, and add text. Another cool feature is the recording scheduler: choose date and time, and the program will record your screen at the right moment.
